entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0] microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain\WorkloadManifest.targets hardcodes net6.0 as TFM #60745
  • [release/3.1] Add area owners file to ensure that there is a packaging review on the servicing-approved prs #60743
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord throws an InvalidOperationException on Windows 11 #60740
  • `CultureInfo` constructor fails with string "x-TEST" #60737
    7.0.0
  • system.drawing.tests.pentests.ctor_color_width failing in CI #60731
  • SocketsHttpHandler should proactively handle EOF from server on idle HTTP/1.1 connections #60729
  • ClickOnce - Value Does Not Fall Within the Expected Range #60715
  • [iOS/tvOS] Small set of test suites time out on devices #60713
    7.0.0
  • Runtime<->JIT reloc hinting mechanism needs work #60712
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.* (breaking?) change in NET6.0 #60710
  • [Required(AllowEmptyStrings = true)] data annotation causes client side validation error on empty strings #60716

Closed

  • [System.Text.Json] Add ability to serialize Comments on Properties #35251
    Future
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.AdditionalAttributesOnStub.SkipLocalsInitOnDownlevelTargetFrameworks(referenceAssemblies: ReferenceAssemblies { Assemblies = [], AssemblyIdentityComparer = AssemblyIdentityComparer { }, FacadeAssemblies = [], LanguageSpecificAssemblies = [], NuGetConfigFilePath = null, ... }, expectSkipLocalsInit: True) #60706
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Overflow throw exception #48350
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNamingPolicy not effect ExpandoObject #47707
    Future
  • Enable Utf8JsonReader to read json from stream #30328
    Future
  • serializeasync object to utf8jsonwriter with System.Text.Json #41943
    Future
  • Azure Function fails to load System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #54642
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json does not support TypeConverters #38812
    Future
  • MonoAOTCompiler: fast path "nothing changed" case #58975
    7.0.0
  • CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182
    6.0.0
  • Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse() #387
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add File.ReadAllLinesAsync methods that return IAsyncEnumerable<string> #60719
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelation(options: Compiled) #60707
  • JsonElement implement standard interfaces #39384
    Future
  • Better handling of optional JSON properties in System.Text.Json #30450
    Future
  • Add support for path in JsonPropertyName to access nested property when deserializing json payload #38324
    Future
  • Improve multi-segment Utf8JsonReader test coverage for ReadOnlySequence #27949
    Future
  • Android x64: runtime tests failing - `Failed to install mobile app` #59679

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename USE_UPPER_ADDRESS -> USE_PREFERRED_RANGE, support it on Unix platforms #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Remove exclusions to bad paths #60744
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Temp mono wasm branch for debugging 1388 #60742
    area-Serialization
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix GCC warnings in test build #60734
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: some enhancements to redundant branch opts #60732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable additional llvmfullaot Linux_arm64 CI lane #60730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Properly use result value for dump IPC cmd #60726
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Simplify runtime test projects #60724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Turn off reloc generation for handles #60721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix typo in comment: NoPropogateInherit -> NoPropagateInherit #60717
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove xunit-performance dependency in tests #60711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows #60746
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add direct SDK installer links #53061
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [llvmonly] Optimize delegate invocation. #60593
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix intermittent failure in DllImportGenerator unit tests when resolving assemblies #60722
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Reduce time for Regex tests #60660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add test for profiler inlining #60225
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Temporarily Allow Use of OpenSSL 1.0.2 In Perf Pipelines #60728
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use getexepath in mono to deduplicate related code #60449
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop adding unnecessary variable when marshalling UTF-16 string by value #60708
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Disable DllimportGenerator unit tests on ARM32 #60718
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, disabled-test
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Add copies of binarytrees-6 and fannkuch-redux-9 #60700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Several tweaks to RegexGenerator (the tool, not the emitted code) #60667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rerun mobile target jobs when it fails for 4 known scenarios #60475
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid int[] allocation in ResourceReader when reading a decimal #60408
    area-System.Resources
  • Fix dependency of LLVM AOT jobs on CoreCLR product for CORE_ROOT #60681
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update docs for PipeReader.TryRead #52237
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono, Future
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add test for blazor/sdk fix for lazy loaded assemblies #60673
    arch-wasm
